how does the nuclear reactor get the neutrons and accelerate them?

there are several types of sources
1. source from spontaneous decay/fission
2. bombarding accelerated atoms to another atom (e.g. plutonium to beryllium)
3. neutron activation
4. chain reaction

acceleration can be done by thermal or DT/DD fusion to generate high energy neutron

如果我地0係一個地方，覺得唔瀟灑，屈住屈住，咁我地就應該退後一格，睇下瀟唔瀟灑，唔瀟灑再退一格，一路退一路退，you can always find a place where you can contribute。contribute呢個字聽落好嚴重，我地不如話feel comfortable，每個人都一定有佢既安樂窩。Remember，you only live once，但係如果你連大學既野都handle 唔到既話，you have to think seriously, or think of doing something else。

你可以唔同意我咁講，it's fine，i don't care。"

一條beam相對"以太"係移動緊另外一條冇
照常理以太應該可以減條beam速
但係兩條beam竟然可以同時到,咁咪姐係冇以太+光速恆定
冇錯因為無線傳播只需要電磁場震盪,所以上太空都可以用wifi/無線充電/無線電etc(唔係既話衛星點傳返data落地球)
(btw太空唔係真係真空,會有interstellar medium,係堆超低密度氣體+星塵 )
光速恆定係愛因斯坦對狹義相對論既假設,而個實驗係想推翻佢個假設,但如你所見,最後結果反而鞏固左個假設,令狹義相對論可以繼續發展
最後你係屌唔到自己既
首先你冇辦法到達光速(一定要無質量先可以),其次係你唔會插到自己,你會插到自己就證明你條撚快過你屎忽,但係我地假設係你用緊恆定速率圍緊棵樹,所以會有矛盾

Radioactivity was detected in 36 of the 55 sample meals from Fukushima, compared with one of 19 controls from Kyoto. The median estimated dose level (μSv/year) was 3.0, ranging from not detectable to 83.1. None of the cow’s milk (21) or vegetable (49) samples showed levels of contamination above the current recommended limits (Bq/kg) of 200 for milk and 500 for vegetables. The total effective dose levels by inhalation were estimated to be <3 μSv/year at nine locations, but samples at three other locations close to the edge of the 20-km radius from the crippled nuclear power plant showed higher levels of contamination (μSv/year): 14.7 at Iitate, 76.9 at Namie, and 27.7 at Katsurao.
